name: Natural: Prefer Batch Programs using Select operations on Natural view using a limit
description: The number of Read operations are counted and compared to the number of Read (xx),i.e. FIND (xx). An artifact is violation whenever the number of regular Read operations is larger than the Read operation with limit specified
rationale: Good practice to use a limit on the Select statement. No limit specified makes one additional record being read everytime

technicalCriteria.name: Efficiency - Memory, Network and Disk Space Management
